name: Climate Change Armageddon
description:
All across the world, industries are polluting the world with their filthy and evil smog!

Stop them from destroying our planet by raining meteors down on the polluting factories! But be quick, as the global warming they are causing is drowning our civilization in the rising sea levels!

While this small game exaggerates the effects the effects of it, climate change is a real threat! The British Red Cross is fighting for the people who are affected by it the most. And with a small donation, you can help too!

Read more at https://www.redcross.org.uk/about-us/what-we-do/climate-change .
